verses.verse: I cried <WH2199> unto the Lord <WH3068> with my voice <WH6963>; with my voice <WH6963> unto the Lord <WH3068> did I make my supplication <WH2603>.
I poured out <WH8210> my complaint <WH7879> before <WH6440> him <WH5046>; I showed before <WH6440> him my trouble <WH6869>.

When my spirit <WH7307> was overwhelmed <WH5848> inside me <WH3045>, then you knew my path <WH5410>. In the way <WH734> where <WH2098> I walked <WH1980> have they privately laid <WH2934> a snare for me <WH6341>.
I looked <WH5027> on my right hand <WH3225>, and looked <WH7200>, but there was no man that would know <WH5234> me <WH4498>: refuge failed <WH6> me <WH1875>; no man cared for my soul <WH5315>.
I cried <WH2199> unto you <WH3068>, O Lord: I said <WH559>, You are my refuge <WH4268> and my portion <WH2506> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.
Attend <WH7181> unto my cry <WH7440>; for I am brought <WH1809> very <WH3966> low <WH1809>: deliver <WH5337> me from my persecutors <WH7291>; for they are stronger than I <WH553>.

Bring <WH3318> my soul <WH5315> out of prison <WH4525>, that I may praise <WH3034> your name <WH8034>: the righteous <WH6662> shall compass me about <WH3803>; for you shall deal bountifully with me <WH1580>.
